links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
maple: nthmember := proc(e,l) local k; if(member(e,l,'k')) then RETURN(k) else RETURN(0); fi; end;
mathematica: a[n_] := If[p = Position[A054424, n]; p != {}, p[[1, 1]], 0]; (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Aug 20 2013 *)
